org.mapfish.print.processor.map.scalebar

Class BarScalebarDrawer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mapfish.print.processor.map.scalebar.ScalebarDrawer

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BarSubScalebarDrawer

    public class BarScalebarDrawer
extends ScalebarDrawer
    Draw a bar with alternating black and white zones marking the sub-intervals.

    • Method Detail

      • drawBar

        protected void drawBar()
        Description copied from class: ScalebarDrawer
        Draws the bar itself. The transformation is setup in a manner where the bar should be drawn into the rectangle (0, 0) (intervals*intervalWidth, -barSize).
        Specified by:
        drawBar in class ScalebarDrawer
